ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] Parsing
ygData.msgSnippet: Heritrix doesn t do any parsing of the content that it downloads: it uses complex regular expressions to extract data from the downloaded content. If you want

Heritrix doesn't do any parsing of the content that it downloads: it
uses complex regular expressions to extract data from the downloaded
content.

If you want to do more advanced document processing, I'd probably do
it as a filter on the ARC writer, and only save data that passes your
checks. Note that doing this processing during the crawl will
significantly slow things down. Tidy and similar tools are usually
pretty slow, compared to simply writing the output.

    -tree
